Thank you for considering reaching out to me.

To ensure prompt response, please use the following methods for best communication:

**Post questions as comments** on the relevant article to benefit other readers and avoid duplication. **Email inquiries will not be addressed**, but redirected to the comments section.

Report mistakes, bugs, or inaccuracies by **creating an issue on** [GitHub](https://github.com/NING3739). For those familiar with GitHub, feel free to edit the file and submit a pull request for speedy incorporation of your changes.

Before contacting me, please **check the comments section** for a possible answer to your question.

Thank you!
